verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG2: a nor'easter next up in albany] [ARG1: a nor'easter could hit by the weekend] meteorologists say it is too soon to say whether next week halloween costumes should incorporate snow boots but forecasters are keeping their eye on a coastal storm that could to hit the capital region by saturday it bears watching said christina speciale a meteorologist with the national weather service in albany it definitely something to keep an eye on nor'easter albany gulf stream national weather service christina speciale national oceanic and atmospheric administration south carolina
